chunk:
Rocky Mountain Soap Co. Restorative Face Serum, Pomegranate (2019 formulation)

Brand: Rocky Mountain Soap Co.

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamine E), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Cymbopogon Martinii Var. Motia

Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamine E), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Cymbopogon Martinii Var. Motia (Palmarosa) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Var. Amara (Neroli) Oil

Directions: Apply 3-4 drops and massage onto clean, toned face and neck before moisturizing, in the morning or before bed.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
